Articles.Content:
The conspiracy theorists, the UFO seekers, the "people-who-think-they-know-a-lot-but-actually-don't"(I think I'm one)... the ignorance is everywhere!

You want to do everything to prove to those people that their theories are wrong, but all you can do is swear at the screen.

This is when this thread comes in:

- This thread is a repository of intelligent answers that you can post or say to those conspiracy nuts.

- Answers can be as long as an essay, or as short as a one-liner, smart-[excretory tubule] answer-backs.

- Can be used as a mental training exercise!

How this thread works:

- Stuff (conspiracy-theorist news articles, UFO videos, etc) will be posted here. Anyone can post.

- People on this thread will create answers (proofs, witty answers, etc). The answers will be in BOLD AND UNDERLINED.

- People can just express their own opinions on the videos/other stuff (forum rules apply), posting answer-backs is not required.

- If you have an opinion that supports the videos/other stuffs (the Earth is flat, Apollo is fake, etc), and have legitimate proof for it, you can post that. While we do not respect blatant, ignorant fools, we do respect people with actual proof to support their ideas, and will consider their opinions. If a personnel posting a conspiracy proof does not have good reasoning, we will KINDLY and RESPECTFULLY give him the counter-proof. We are only allowed to treat the person like the aforementioned blatant fool if he does not consider the counter-proof and keeps on insisting without any reasoning.

To start off:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vrubfqFekPI

http://www.express.co.uk/news/science/637061/End-world-Conspiracy-theorists-new-Planet-9-discovery-spark-apocalypse-Nibiru-Planet-X

Let the battle begin!

Well, guys. What usually happens in threads of this sort is that somebody comes along with a contrary opinion, and then others attack him/her, and it turns into arguments and insults and we have to close the thread. Try not to do that this time, okay? 

How does it get started? By identifying one side as absolutely wrong, so that anyone who believes in it is a "blatant fool" and a "conspiracy nut." Even if you do really believe that, calling people names is not going to convince them of the validity of your own arguments. 

So restrict the discussion to proof and facts, because just mocking how stupid "they" are compared to "us" will get the thread shut down.
Jet fuel can't melt steel beams!

I am also planning to control the course of this thread, calling p moderators to give out warnings if answers get out of hand. NOTE, I DON'T WANT THIS TO BE INSULTING, I JUST WANT THIS TO BE HUMOROUS. Isn't that enough?

I see a crucial flaw here in your process of dealing with ignorance. In my experience doing so helps nothing to very little in the grand scheme of things. Why you even attempt to do so if you don't enjoy it?

Also... human stupidity is so beautiful. Why would you deny others the joy of marveling in certain constellations of beliefs and ideas and fixations in someone's mind?

Why not just start threads or reply to posts in forums dedicated to the subject at hand:  conspiracy theories, etc. ?

It seems rather "wasted" in a forum consisting mainly of people who play a video game.

10 minutes ago, Gaarst said:

Jet fuel can't melt steel beams!

Answer:

The burning temperature of the hydrocarbons in Jet-A fuel is approximately 980*C. The temperature at which steel turns into a significantly less strong material is approximately 700*C. Though it will not melt iron, Jet fuel will considerably weaken it. Combine that with the force of impact and the following explosion, and the trade centers are screwed.
